title: Client Problems help!
body: Hi , my league of legends client keeps crashing mid game  this has only started to effect me recently . I wouldn't have been bothered by it but it has resulted in me getting a Leave buster . Does anyone else have these issues and is there anyway I can get it revoked?

replies.body: Crashes can be caused by a pretty wide variety of things, but most of the time it happens from some damaged or corrupted game files. I'd suggest taking some time to go through our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to see if those steps can help out. If not, let me know a little more about what happens when the game crashes and we can troubleshoot a little more!
